channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- PlantUML
channel.description: The latest CVEs for unspecified -- PlantUML

item.title: CVE-2020-36523|2024-08-04T17:30:08.328Z -- unspecified -- plantuml
item.description: A vulnerability was found in PlantUML 6.43. It has been declared as problematic. Affected by this vulnerability is the component Database Information Macro. The manipulation leads to cross site scripting. The attack can be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.
